critique: The document aims to bring order and fairness to the textile industry labor practices. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are joy (through fair labor practices), and reduced fear and sadness (by addressing excessive work assignments). There might be some surprise at the level of intervention, and potentially disgust from those who disagree with the regulations, but these are secondary. The initial scores reflect this assessment. The critique focuses on refining the intensity of each emotion based on the document's content and purpose.
